DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare two therapeutic procedure treatment isolated varicosis anterior accessory great saphenous vein ( AAGSV ) : crossectomy avulsion varicose AAGSV versus foam sclerotherapy AAGSV .
DOC.brief_title: Surgery Versus Sclerotherapy Isolated Accessory Great Saphenous Vein Varicosis
DOC.criteria: reflux anterior accessory great saphenous vein ( AAGSV ) > 0,5 sek concomitant reflux great saphenous vein ( GSV ) reflux deep venous system ( postthrombotic syndrome ) acute thrombosis hypercoagulability allergy aethoxysclerol local anesthetic immobility open foramen ovale bacterial infection skin pregnancy breast feed peripheral arterial occlusive disease III , IV ( PAOD )
